newAssessment.title: New work assignment assessment
newAssessment.intro: Enter the basic details of the planned assignment. The system will check the country matrix and indicate whether a notification is required.
newAssessment.activityHint: Select the option that best matches the main purpose of the trip.
newAssessment.durationHint: Duration is calculated automatically from the dates.
newAssessment.mobileOnly: 100% mobile work (no on-site presence at customer or HYDAC site)
newAssessment.mobileHint: If checked, the system will apply any special rules for pure mobile work from the matrix.
newAssessment.endDateError: End date must be after or equal to start date.

summary.title: Assessment summary
summary.noData: No assessment data available. Please start a new assessment.
summary.disclaimer: This internal tool provides guidance based on the currently stored country matrix. It does not replace legal advice. In case of doubt, contact Corporate HR/Legal.

rulesUpload.title: Upload rules (country matrix)
rulesUpload.hint: Upload a semicolon-delimited CSV file with the country matrix.
rulesUpload.fallbackNote: The system continues using the previous active rules.
